title: Virgin Islands National Park: Public Transportation
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Public Transportation              Public Transportation         Vitran bus at the public ferry dock in Cruz Bay, St. John.Â  Buses leave dock every hour at 20 minutes past the hour.   VITRAN buses travel between Cruz Bay and Salt Pond Bay (on the southeastern side of the Island) along Centerline Road (Route 10). The buses leave from the public ferry dock at 20 minutes past the hour beginning at 6 a.m. and ending at 7:25 p.m. daily.
